column2: most of the staff was great
column3: but our waiter was TERRIBLE. It was a busy morning
column4: but he was completely checked out
column5: forgetting to put in orders and bringing out single plates of food at random intervals. In all
column6: after getting to our table and ordering right away
column7: breakfast took nearly 2hr with the last (forgotten) plate coming out as we asked for the check -- seemed like every table around us was having the same experience..
